title: Kanye West, Clickhole, the world's smallest woman - Today's Pop Culture Live! | Culture | The Guardian
summary: have n't i see you somewhere before ?
this week 's # reviewanything is up , by the way .
you 've seen this flying lotus teaser right ?
the uk has a new twerking champion .

documents.title: and we 're done
text: it 's been an eventful day on the guide daily .
after our report on the uk twerking championships , basement jaxx tweeted us to let us know they have a contender for the crown .
to be frank i 'm no expert in the rules of twerking at a competition level but i suspect having a robotic exoskeleton rules one out .
do n't forget to up tomorrow 's guide , in which we go on set of the new doctor who - here 's a sneak peek at the cover .
tomorrow 's guide .
also in the issue , an interview with luc besson , lethal bizzle lifting weights , most haunted , and sylvester stallone getting the infomania treatment .
have a grand weekend .

documents.title: have n't i see you somewhere before ?
text: nearly forgot to express my bemusement at the fox series wayward pines , a 10-part thriller directed by m night shyamalan due to come to uk screens next year .
the series will star matt dillon as a secret service agent investigating a murder in a sinister , remote town in which everyone is harbouring their own secrets .
if this sounds familiar - and of course it bloody does - m night himself has fessed up this is pretty much a straight twin peaks rip off .
all the same , the audacity is quite something , is n't it ?
perhaps after he can turn his attention to new productions like the rhinoceros man , hidden highway and mullhollywood drive .
that 's if the last airbender 2 does n't get in the way .

documents.title: this week 's # reviewanything is up , by the way
text: within , we appraise phlegmy death metal , a hideous jls portrait and a song about luke haines .
go see .

documents.title: you 've seen this flying lotus teaser right ?
text: not for epileptics , or indeed for anyone who feels uncertain about the sensation of having your brain sucked out your ear and catapulted through a wormhole .
on acid .
it 's to promote the la rap producer 's forthcoming new album you 're dead , a shamanic pilgrimage into the psychedelic unknown of the infinite afterlife '' .
also along for the ride , snoop dogg and herbie hancock .
meanwhile , when steve ellison is n't being flying lotus , he 's a rapper called captain murphy , and is rather down with the us adult cartoon network adult swim .
witness here his colourful creation story .

documents.title: the uk has a new twerking champion
text: good news for fans of muscular but still mobile buttocks : the uk twerking championships 2014 took place at london 's scala last night , and here 's a video of the highlights .
thirteen women took place in the head-to-head - arse-to-arse ?
- battle , with first place going to jemini , who wins £ 1000 and a chance to shake her stuff on nicki minaj 's uk tour .
for me the most intriguing moment comes about 20 seconds in , when a reclining man is twerk-slammed ( is there a word for this ? )
and then sort of buttock-pummelled ( and this ? )
repeatedly .
the look on his face : neither agony nor ecstasy , but somewhere betwixt .
also : blimey .
# smallzworld # 24 ( @ selectasmallz ) u love the fuckery @ twitterid ��

documents.title: lunchtime links
text: here 's some things to do as you cram food into your maw .
read guide powerhouse lanre bakare on swedish rap sensation yung lean .
sam leith explains why we love to hate martin amis .
gentrification , carrot-sticks and modelling for burberry with new london indie hopes childhood .
bjork 's biophilia live show is getting a proper release and looks pretty barmy .

documents.title: enter the clickhole
text: very much enjoying the onion 's new site clickhole , a sort of send-up of buzzfeed/listicle journalism , which is obviously far , far beneath us at here at the guide daily .
current highlights include '7 highlights you 're the 'i live in the heating ducts ' guy in your office ' , 'are you a real '90s kid with lupus ? '
and '9 impossibly cute animals eating people food , by guest aggregator jonathan franzen ' .
the internet just ate itself .

documents.title: # reviewanything
text: not true , tupac : the guardian guide is also equipped for such purpose .
it 's # reviewanything day , and in case you 're wondering , that is exactly what it sounds like .

you send us things that you , or your friends , or enemies have made - expressions of your deep inner psyche , rendered as cultural product - and we kindly appraise it , albeit often in a way that you wo n't want to include on a future press release .
still , as they say - do n't read your press , weigh it .
does that work on the internet ?

documents.title: jacko 's back !
text: sort of .
i think it 's very much a reflection of the sheer abundance of the king of pop 's talents that , even several years after his death , he continues to release brand new music .
last night , for instance , he returned from the great hereafter to tweet the following .
michael jackson ( @ michaeljackson ) it 's time !
the first ever premiere of `` a place with no name '' right now on twitter # mjxscape it 's not the only jacko song to be rattling round the web today , so let 's settle down to appraise them both .
michael jackson - a place with no name dawn in the desert .
waves lash against a shore .
a woman - not sure who - appears to have got tangled in a bedsheet .
brief shot of michael jackson in white tanktop , possibly gleaned from a bit of film found on a cutting room floor .
song is a squelchy electronic funk number about getting a flat tyre in the desert , a theme the video wisely attempts to render as literally as possible .
jackson is looking for a place with no name '' , which may be why he is lost in the first place .
i wish the video would stop going between colour and black-and-white as temporally speaking , it 's kind of upsetting .
maybe this is unavoidable when you have to beam a song in from the afterlife .

guide rating : 3/5 michael jackson - days in gloucestershire a long lost , recently rediscovered demo , days in gloucestershire was reportedly written in 1998 and recorded in 2003 , with the king of pop planning to complete it while in the uk , possibly around those shows that never happened .
the song deals with jacko 's happy memories of a jackson 5 visit to the english county , known for its pigs , cheese-rolling and fred and rose west .

none of these are addressed in the song , although its bucolic prettiness reminds one a little of nick drake , and jackson 's pronunciation of gloucestershire '' proves he was still as this stage brave enough to push the envelope and challenge familiar language norms .
in short , a great addition to the michael jackson catalogue .
guide rating : 4/5

documents.title: in 'er , is this ok ' news
text: the tv series american horror story : freak show have cast one jyoti amge , the world 's smallest woman .
ryan murphy ( @ mrrpmurphy ) jessica and our newest cast member jyoti amge the world 's smallest woman .
bit more on that here .

documents.title: kanye fires dj , but still the messiah , apparently
text: do you essentially have quite a lot of respect for kanye west as both man and artist , but also enjoy having a chuckle when embarrassing things happen to him ?
then we may be soulmates and you should take a look at this youtube compilation of clips of his dj - former dj i might add - buggering things up , live , in front of large audiences .
oh dj mano .
luckily the feeling is definitely totally mutual and he 's pretty cool about it .
i think .
zero cool mano™ 20/3 ( @ callmemano ) gon na have a fun day blocking these kanye stans that are happy i do n't dj 4 him anymore hahahahaha !
hahahaha !
have you heard about this thing church of yeezus ?
it 's the work of some guy called brian from a relatively uninteresting bit of america who has decided that kanye west is the new messiah .
the natural response to something like this is that he is , in the uk parlance , taking the piss .
but i actually got him on the phone a few months back and he seemed unusually sincere .
over to brian : it 's taking the tenets of christianity , ideas from new-school thought , and rehashing them together with kanye as the model of behaviour , if you will .
i 've been a fan since the college dropout , but he put the idea out there , with his album yeezus .
that song , i am a god - i did n't want to sing along at first , i was like , is this blasphemous ?
no one believes in themselves like kanye .
people say he 's self-obsessed , but nothing could be further than the truth .
he 's a giving person who 's passionate about bringing his vision to life .
just sometimes he gets a little rude .
magnificently , yeezianity seems to have legs .
a video arguing his divinity here .
compelling , i 'm sure you 'll agree .
morning all , and welcome to friday 's rolling liveblog .
there is much to discuss , but let 's kick off with this enjoyable raucous ty segall performance off of conan .
just enough cowbell , i 'd say .
ty 's new album manipulator is out on drag city on august 26 , and is well worth a listen i 'd say .

bulletin.text: Good day, we're the Guardian Guide's rolling live blog.
Bringing you gossip, cultcha news, other tat.
Including: Kanye looking upset, M Night Shyamalan, and all the news from the UK Twerking Championship 2014 (if there is any)
